root.message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 12-c-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: 12.c.1 Amount of fossil fuel subsidies per unit of GDP (production and consumption) and as a proportion of total national spending on these fuels
12.c.1 Montant des subventions aux combustibles fossiles par unité de PIB (production et consommation) et en proportion des dépenses nationales totales consacrées à ces combustibles
